00061 #define FIX(x) (Identifier)(x+0.5)
00062 // implements a vector of fixed length 3
00063 class Vector3 {
00064  protected:
00065   real* data_;
00066  public:
00067   Vector3( void );
00068   Vector3( const Vector3& v );
00069   Vector3( real x);
00070   Vector3( real x, real y, real z );
00071 
00072   template < typename real_t > Vector3( const real_t* x0 );
00073 
00074   ~Vector3();
00075 
00076   Vector3& operator=( const Vector3& b );
00077   Vector3& operator=( const real& x );
00078   Vector3& operator-( void );
00079   Vector3 operator+( const Vector3& x ) const;
00080   Vector3 operator-( const Vector3& x ) const;
00081   Vector3 operator*( const real& x );
00082   Vector3 operator/( const real& x );
00083   Vector3& operator+=( const Vector3& x );
00084   Vector3& operator-=( const Vector3& x );
00085   Vector3& operator*=( const real& x );
00086   Vector3& operator/=( const real& x );
00087   real& operator() ( const unsigned i );
00088   //dot product
00089   real operator*( const Vector3& vb ) const;
00090   // cross product
00091   Vector3 operator^( const Vector3& vb ) const;
00092   real norm( void ) const;
00093   real norm2( void ) const;
00094   Vector3& normalize( void );
00095 
00096   std::string toString( void );
00097 };
